actions.name: Queenly Majesty

cost.trigger: A creature in range declares a [Interrupt X] Action not targeting itself.

actions.description:
Trigger: A in range creature declares a [Interrupt X] Action not targeting itself.

Effect: The triggering Action fails and if it was an Attack, the triggering Action is @Affliction[disabled] 5.

system.description:
Trigger: A creature declares a [Interrupt X] Action not targeting itself.

Effect: The triggering Action fails and if it was an Attack, the triggering Action is @Affliction[disabled] 5.
